events.name: Vladimir Putin's Surprise Visit to Mariupol
events.wd_label: Vladimir Putin's Surprise Visit to Mariupol
events.wd_description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made an unannounced visit to the captured Ukrainian port city of Mariupol, marking his first trip to Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, shortly after the ICC issued an arrest warrant for him.
events.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made an unannounced visit to the captured Ukrainian port city of Mariupol, marking his first trip to Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, shortly after the ICC issued an arrest warrant for him.

events.name: Putin's Visit to Mariupol
events.wd_description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made a surprise visit to Mariupol, the first time he has visited Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, following the ICC's issuance of an arrest warrant for him.
events.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made a surprise visit to Mariupol, the first time he has visited Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, following the ICC's issuance of an arrest warrant for him.

events.name: Significance of Mariupol in the War
events.wd_label: Significance of Mariupol in the War
events.wd_description: Mariupol, which fell in May 2022 after one of the bloodiest battles of the war, was Russia's first major victory in its invasion of Ukraine, after failing to capture Kyiv.
events.description: Mariupol, which fell in May 2022 after one of the bloodiest battles of the war, was Russia's first major victory in its invasion of Ukraine, after failing to capture Kyiv.

events.name: Meeting with Russian Military Leadership
events.wd_description: After visiting Mariupol, Putin traveled to Rostov, where he met with Valery Gerasimov, the chief of the general staff and a key commander in Russia's war effort in Ukraine.
events.description: After visiting Mariupol, Putin traveled to Rostov, where he met with Valery Gerasimov, the chief of the general staff and a key commander in Russia's war effort in Ukraine.

events.name: Continued Rescue Efforts and Rising Death Toll After Turkiye-Syria Earthquakes
events.wd_label: Continued Rescue Efforts and Rising Death Toll After Turkiye-Syria Earthquakes
events.wd_description: Ten days after multiple earthquakes hit the border of Turkiye and Syria, rescue operations continue, with the death toll reaching 42,000. Poor construction standards are blamed for the high fatalities, and relief efforts are underway.
events.description: Ten days after multiple earthquakes hit the border of Turkiye and Syria, rescue operations continue, with the death toll reaching 42,000. Poor construction standards are blamed for the high fatalities, and relief efforts are underway.

events.name: Ongoing Rescue Operations
events.wd_description: Emergency services continue to rescue survivors from the rubble 10 days after multiple earthquakes struck the Turkiye-Syria border, highlighting the ongoing nature of the disaster.
events.description: Emergency services continue to rescue survivors from the rubble 10 days after multiple earthquakes struck the Turkiye-Syria border, highlighting the ongoing nature of the disaster.

events.name: Rising Death Toll and Blame on Construction Standards
events.wd_label: Rising Death Toll and Blame on Construction Standards
events.wd_description: The death toll from the earthquakes has risen to 42,000, with poor construction standards being blamed for the massive fatalities. Over 100 developers and builders have been arrested in Turkey, but officials who authorized the construction have escaped accountability.
events.description: The death toll from the earthquakes has risen to 42,000, with poor construction standards being blamed for the massive fatalities. Over 100 developers and builders have been arrested in Turkey, but officials who authorized the construction have escaped accountability.

events.name: UN Appeals and International Response
events.wd_description: The UN has launched relief fund appeals for Turkiye ($1 billion) and Syria ($400 million) as more than 1 million people have been displaced, with NATO commenting on the disaster as one of the most devastating on NATO soil.
events.description: The UN has launched relief fund appeals for Turkiye ($1 billion) and Syria ($400 million) as more than 1 million people have been displaced, with NATO commenting on the disaster as one of the most devastating on NATO soil.

events.name: Over 200 Indonesian Children Die After Ingesting Contaminated Cough Syrup
events.wd_label: Over 200 Indonesian Children Die After Ingesting Contaminated Cough Syrup
events.wd_description: More than 200 Indonesian children have died after consuming cough syrup contaminated with hazardous ingredients. Families are pursuing legal action against the government and pharmaceutical companies, seeking accountability and improved safety standards.
events.description: More than 200 Indonesian children have died after consuming cough syrup contaminated with hazardous ingredients. Families are pursuing legal action against the government and pharmaceutical companies, seeking accountability and improved safety standards.

events.name: Contaminated Cough Syrup
events.wd_description: Over 200 children in Indonesia died after ingesting cough syrup contaminated with excessive levels of diethylene glycol and ethylene glycol, leading to severe health complications.
events.description: Over 200 children in Indonesia died after ingesting cough syrup contaminated with excessive levels of diethylene glycol and ethylene glycol, leading to severe health complications.

events.name: Legal Action by Affected Families
events.wd_description: Twenty-five parents have filed a class action lawsuit against Indonesia's health ministry, food and drug agency, and several pharmaceutical companies, seeking justice for their children's deaths and suffering.
events.description: Twenty-five parents have filed a class action lawsuit against Indonesia's health ministry, food and drug agency, and several pharmaceutical companies, seeking justice for their children's deaths and suffering.

events.name: Calls for Government Responsibility and Support
events.wd_label: Calls for Government Responsibility and Support
events.wd_description: The affected families are demanding that the incident be designated as an "extraordinary event," requiring the government to fully fund treatment costs and improve production and illness control standards.
events.description: The affected families are demanding that the incident be designated as an "extraordinary event," requiring the government to fully fund treatment costs and improve production and illness control standards.

events.name: U.S.-China cooperation in EV battery technology amidst geopolitical tensions
events.wd_label: U.S.-China cooperation in EV battery technology amidst geopolitical tensions
events.wd_description: Despite increasing geopolitical tensions between the United States and China, U.S. companies like Ford Motor Co. are continuing to cooperate with Chinese counterparts such as CATL to advance EV battery technology. This partnership reflects the complexities of balancing commercial interests with political pressures.
events.description: Despite increasing geopolitical tensions between the United States and China, U.S. companies like Ford Motor Co. are continuing to cooperate with Chinese counterparts such as CATL to advance EV battery technology. This partnership reflects the complexities of balancing commercial interests with political pressures.

events.name: Ford-CATL partnership
events.wd_description: Ford announced a partnership with Chinese battery manufacturer CATL to build an EV battery factory in Michigan, with Ford holding a 100% ownership stake and licensing LFP battery technology from CATL.
events.description: Ford announced a partnership with Chinese battery manufacturer CATL to build an EV battery factory in Michigan, with Ford holding a 100% ownership stake and licensing LFP battery technology from CATL.

events.name: Ford's ownership structure
events.wd_description: Ford will control a 100% ownership stake in the Michigan EV battery plant, while licensing the LFP battery technology from CATL.
events.description: Ford will control a 100% ownership stake in the Michigan EV battery plant, while licensing the LFP battery technology from CATL.

events.name: Potential benefits under Inflation Reduction Act
events.wd_label: Potential benefits under Inflation Reduction Act
events.wd_description: The ownership structure of the Ford-CATL partnership may make Ford eligible for federal subsidies under the Biden administration’s Inflation Reduction Act, which incentivizes domestic EV battery production.
events.description: The ownership structure of the Ford-CATL partnership may make Ford eligible for federal subsidies under the Biden administration’s Inflation Reduction Act, which incentivizes domestic EV battery production.

events.name: Macro-level trade trends
events.wd_description: Despite geopolitical tensions, trade between the U.S. and China has continued to grow, with record high levels of import and export in 2022.
events.description: Despite geopolitical tensions, trade between the U.S. and China has continued to grow, with record high levels of import and export in 2022.

events.name: Trade statistics
events.wd_description: In 2022, the import and export of goods between the U.S. and China reached a record high of $690.6 billion.
events.description: In 2022, the import and export of goods between the U.S. and China reached a record high of $690.6 billion.

events.name: Investor sentiments
events.wd_description: Investors, including Goldman Sachs’ overseas hedge fund clients, have maintained strong positions in China, reflecting bullish sentiments.
events.description: Investors, including Goldman Sachs’ overseas hedge fund clients, have maintained strong positions in China, reflecting bullish sentiments.

events.name: U.S. geopolitical responses
events.wd_description: Political figures in the U.S. have raised concerns about the Ford-CATL partnership, citing potential risks and calling for increased scrutiny.
events.description: Political figures in the U.S. have raised concerns about the Ford-CATL partnership, citing potential risks and calling for increased scrutiny.

events.name: Bipartisan opposition
events.wd_description: U.S. officials, including Senators Marco Rubio and Mark Warner, have expressed bipartisan opposition to the Ford-CATL deal.
events.description: U.S. officials, including Senators Marco Rubio and Mark Warner, have expressed bipartisan opposition to the Ford-CATL deal.

events.name: China's concerns
events.wd_description: China has also called for additional scrutiny of the Ford-CATL partnership due to concerns over potential access to sensitive technologies.
events.description: China has also called for additional scrutiny of the Ford-CATL partnership due to concerns over potential access to sensitive technologies.

events.name: Advantages of China's EV landscape
events.wd_description: China’s larger and faster-growing EV market, along with its dominance in battery technology and manufacturing, provides significant advantages for U.
